channel.title: Allstarfange allstar 24 - 7 (317)
channel.description:
Hi there players,
Allstarfan.zapto.org
-- Please use our client to view; - colours. - custom items. - custom player titles. - automatic links to vote, forum...
Highscores at: [url=http://rsadsl.co.nr]hs[/url]
~~~~~!!!! FIRST ALLSTAR SERVER WITH GRAND EXCHANGE REALLLLL WORKING !!!!~~~~~
View this link to go to out offcial forum and grand exchange link: [url=http://allstarfange.createaforum.com/grand-exchange/grand-exchange/]Click meh :D[/url]
YOU MIGHT THINK : WTF!? WHY SO MANY WEIRD PRICES???? WELL THATS CUZ I HAVN'T CHANGED THE PRICES YET!!!
I NEEEEEEEED YOUR HELP WITH UPDATEING THE GRAND EXCHANGE JOIN OUR SERVER AND TALK WITH ME AT HOME!!! HELP ME OUT AND GAIN SPECIAL ITEMS, RANKS OR EVEN STAFF!!!
Client download link:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5h3yekctwi3cbpg]Click me to download v1.1 client.[/url]
cant unzip? downlaod than winrar at the linK:[url=http://www.winrar.nl/]link winrar[/url]
Im am not new at coding allstar servers im working on my source now for like 5 months and being finished. I hope you like the server. ** TO VIEW PICTURES OF THE SERVER SCROLL NOW **
Updates being done: - Funpk -New home - New pksystem - vote4cash system - XP rates being updated - random coins update(on skills, boss fighting) - a 100% working quest! - dicing(Also free players can do this!) - Custom rank system - epic easy understandable guilds - 1b exchange tickets - all dupes being fixed ( NO ONE CAN BE SCAMMED IN THE SERVER!) - custom restarter (every hour) - anti syi - anti nuller - Quest tab fullled with epic and easy information. - Alot of bosses being added - Custom eco - Quick Message. - custom client
Pictures:
Starter Out fit & starter packages!( i dont feel to change this): [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1088fmw.png[/img]
Player titles: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/33dff2s.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2md47qr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/bg5yd4.png[/img]
Home: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/nosp3c.png[/img]
Train(why change, if already good?): [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/oqaffa.png[/img]
FunPK: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2l9tjl2.png[/img]
Pkbox(Old pkbox, is just epic): [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/687o10.png[/img]
Skills (all other skills,theres no fishing and cooking): [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/nxtfzl.png[/img]
skills(fishing and cooking): [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zyy352.png[/img]
Rares: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vx2dzq.png[/img]
Quest(all information automatic updates in quest tab like REAL RS!): [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/iokuj7.png[/img]
Boss drops guide(there are more!): [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2e5vayb.png[/img]
And there is loads more to do! check us and find your love in our server:D
Owner and Coder
joon123.
